Plot: A detective examines the mysterious death of George Reeves, the star of the television series Adventures of Superman (1952).
Title: Hollywoodland
Actors: Adrien Brody, Diane Lane, Ben Affleck, Bob Hoskins
tomatoConsensus: More than a movie star murder mystery, Hollywoodland takes it slow in order to reveal the intriguing details of the rise and fall of superstar fame.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 7 nominations.
